mapper.insert: insert into nt_REPLY(rno, nickname, rcomment, grpno, indent, ansnum, noticeno, userid) values ((select NVL(MAX(rno),0)+1 as rno from nt_reply), #{nickname}, #{rcomment}, (select NVL(MAX(grpno),0)+1 as grpno from nt_reply), 0, 0, #{noticeno}, #{userid})
mapper.delete: delete from nt_reply where rno in ( select a.rno from nt_reply a, (select noticeno, grpno, indent, rno, ansnum from nt_reply where rno = #{rno}) b where a.noticeno = b.noticeno and a.grpno = b.grpno and a.indent >= b.indent and a.rno >= b.rno and a.ansnum >= b.ansnum)
